context:
Rearrange the code blocks to create a Class Object ``"Dog"``. A Dog have multiple attributes: name, breed and owner.


Misconception:
    - InitCreates: __init__ must create a new object

choices.fail_msg: If you make a new Dog inside the Dog's init function, it will keep trying to create new Dogs forever, causing the program to get stuck in an endless loop.

choices.content:
self.name = name
self.breed = breed
self.owner = owner
